*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Mrs. John Hall, June 26, 1825. Judicial procedure.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Major Isaac Thomas of *location_mentioned*Rapide*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* has sent me a Memorandum to the following effect—*/p*
*p*"*person_mentioned*Mrs Mary Hall*/person_mentioned* exchanged with *person_mentioned*Archival P Williams*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*a tract "of land on the Bayou Robert */location_mentioned*of two hundred arpents, one half " of which was the property of the *person_mentioned*heirs*/person_mentioned*—I have a twelve month "bond against *person_mentioned*Mrs Hall*/person_mentioned* for $700.—Now if the *person_mentioned*heirs */person_mentioned*will all go "before *person_mentioned*Judge Austin*/person_mentioned* and relinquish all their claim to said two " hundred arpents of land in favor of *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*he will pay my bond " and discharge*person_mentioned* Mrs Hall*/person_mentioned* therefrom—one of the *person_mentioned*heirs */person_mentioned*is a minor and " must [be] represented in the sale or relinquishment conformably " with the laws of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, after the title is there made it must be " sent to the *person_mentioned*Govr*/person_mentioned*- to get his certificate that the act of *person_mentioned*Judge Austin*/person_mentioned* " in receiving the conveyance is comformable to the laws of *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*"*/p*
*p*(Signed) *person_mentioned*J. Thomas*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The above is *person_mentioned*Thomas*/person_mentioned*'s memorandum, I presume you understand the nature of it and if you wish to have the business done, I shall be at*location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Bell*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="07-05-1825">5 of July*/date_mentioned* at which time you can bring forward all the *person_mentioned*heirs*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-26-1825">June 26. 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mrs. John Hall*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
